problem_names:
lemma rabin[intro]:
    assumes "IF = (I, F)" "infs I w" "fins F w"
    shows "rabin IF w"

lemma rabin_elim[elim]:
    assumes "rabin IF w"
    obtains I F
    where "IF = (I, F)" "infs I w" "fins F w"

lemma gen[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w"
    shows "gen P cs w"

lemma gen_elim[elim]:
    assumes "gen P cs w"
    obtains "\<And> c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w"

lemma cogen[intro]:
    assumes "c \<in> set cs" "P c w"
    shows "cogen P cs w"

lemma cogen_elim[elim]:
    assumes "cogen P cs w"
    obtains c
    where "c \<in> set cs" "P c w"
lemma cogen_alt_def: "cogen P cs w \<longleftrightarrow> \<not> gen (\<lambda> c w. Not (P c w)) cs w"
translations:
lemma rabin[intro]:
    assumes "IF = (I, F)" "infs I w" "fins F w"
    shows "rabin IF w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rabin IF w
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  IF = (I, F)
  infs I w
  fins F w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rabin IF w
unfolding rabin_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  IF = (I, F)
  infs I w
  fins F w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case IF of (I, F) \<Rightarrow> \<lambda>w. infs I w \<and> fins F w) w
by auto

lemma rabin_elim[elim]:
    assumes "rabin IF w"
    obtains I F
    where "IF = (I, F)" "infs I w" "fins F w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>I F.
        \<lbrakk>IF = (I, F); infs I w; fins F w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  rabin IF w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>I F.
        \<lbrakk>IF = (I, F); infs I w; fins F w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding rabin_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  (case IF of (I, F) \<Rightarrow> \<lambda>w. infs I w \<and> fins F w) w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>I F.
        \<lbrakk>IF = (I, F); infs I w; fins F w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

definition gen :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'b pred) \<Rightarrow> ('a gen \<Rightarrow> 'b pred)" where
    "gen P cs w \<equiv> \<forall> c \<in> set cs. P c w"

lemma gen[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w"
    shows "gen P cs w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. gen P cs w
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P ?c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. gen P cs w
unfolding gen_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P ?c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>c\<in>set cs. P c w
by auto

lemma gen_elim[elim]:
    assumes "gen P cs w"
    obtains "\<And> c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<And>c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w) \<Longrightarrow>
     thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  gen P cs w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<And>c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w) \<Longrightarrow>
     thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding gen_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>c\<in>set cs. P c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<And>c. c \<in> set cs \<Longrightarrow> P c w) \<Longrightarrow>
     thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

definition cogen :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'b pred) \<Rightarrow> ('a gen \<Rightarrow> 'b pred)" where
    "cogen P cs w \<equiv> \<exists> c \<in> set cs. P c w"

lemma cogen[intro]:
    assumes "c \<in> set cs" "P c w"
    shows "cogen P cs w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cogen P cs w
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  c \<in> set cs
  P c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cogen P cs w
unfolding cogen_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  c \<in> set cs
  P c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>c\<in>set cs. P c w
by auto

lemma cogen_elim[elim]:
    assumes "cogen P cs w"
    obtains c
    where "c \<in> set cs" "P c w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> set cs; P c w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  cogen P cs w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> set cs; P c w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding cogen_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>c\<in>set cs. P c w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>c \<in> set cs; P c w\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto
lemma cogen_alt_def: "cogen P cs w \<longleftrightarrow> \<not> gen (\<lambda> c w. Not (P c w)) cs w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cogen P cs w = (\<not> gen (\<lambda>c w. \<not> P c w) cs w)
by auto
end
